testcase.name: testLoginConMock

error.message:
Mockito cannot mock this class: interface dao.interfaces.IUsuarioDAO.
If you're not sure why you're getting this error, please open an issue on GitHub.
Java : 24 JVM vendor name : Azul Systems, Inc. JVM vendor version : 24.0.2+12 JVM name : OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM JVM version : 24.0.2+12 JVM info : mixed mode, sharing OS name : Windows 11 OS version : 10.0
You are seeing this disclaimer because Mockito is configured to create inlined mocks. You can learn about inline mocks and their limitations under item #39 of the Mockito class javadoc.
Underlying exception : org.mockito.exceptions.base.MockitoException: Could not modify all classes [interface dao.interfaces.IUsuarioDAO]
